verses.verse: ( The Dispute over Circumcision) Καί <WG2532> Kai Then τινες <WG5100> tines some men κατελθόντες <WG2718> katelthontes came down ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Ἰουδαίας <WG2449> Ioudaias Judea ἐδίδασκον <WG1321> edidaskon [and] were teaching τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἀδελφοὺς <WG80> adelphous brothers ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean “ Unless μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . περιτμηθῆτε <WG4059> peritmēthēte you are circumcised τῷ <WG3588> tō according to the ἔθει <WG1485> ethei custom τῷ <WG3588> tō - Μωϋσέως <WG3475> Mōuseōs of Moses , οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe you cannot σωθῆναι <WG4982> sōthēnai be saved . ”
